Chris Bryant, who believes he may have been a victim of the phone hackers, said Friday he welcomed the decision to re-examine the case, adding that it should not have been closed last month. The evidence that this goes far deeper than one rotten apple has continued to stack up, and so a fresh pair of eyes looking at the case is very welcome, he said. Bryant said the police had "severely" damaged their credibility by failing to properly investigate earlier. Andy Coulson and the News of The World have denied the charges. OAKLAND

Lo afferma l'amministratore delegato di Fiat e Chrysler, Sergio Marchionne , dicendosi non soddisfatto della joint venture fra Fiat e Tata Motors: Dobbiamo dare una nuova dimensione all "accordo. Abbiamo dato loro il diritto di distribuire e in alcune aree non sta funzionando. E' tutto sul tavolo. Tata Motors controlla il 50% di Fiat India Automobiles.
